diamonds.title: Round Brilliant Diamond
diamonds.desc: Maximum fire and brilliance with ideal symmetry.
diamonds.longDesc: Round brilliant diamonds are the most popular and scientifically optimized cut for maximum sparkle. With perfect light return and balanced proportions, this stone is ideal for high-end jewellery and long-term gemstone investment.

diamonds.title: Oval Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Elegant elongated brilliance with slimming appearance.
diamonds.longDesc: Oval cut diamonds combine the sparkle of round brilliant with an elongated silhouette that appears larger per carat. Preferred for elegant rings and modern luxury jewellery designs.

diamonds.title: Emerald Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Clean step facets highlighting crystal clarity.
diamonds.longDesc: Emerald cut diamonds are prized for their elegant hall-of-mirrors effect, showcasing exceptional clarity and sophisticated geometry, favored by collectors of classic luxury.

diamonds.title: Pear Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Pear shaped diamonds blend round and marquise styles, producing unique brilliance and flattering elongation, popular in statement pendants and designer rings.

diamonds.title: Marquise Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Long shape that maximizes visual size.
diamonds.longDesc: Marquise diamonds offer dramatic length and brilliance, giving excellent face-up size per carat. Often selected for bold luxury designs and collector jewellery.

diamonds.title: Princess Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Sharp modern brilliance with square symmetry.
diamonds.longDesc: Princess cut diamonds are modern favourites delivering strong sparkle with sharp geometric appeal, widely used in contemporary engagement jewellery.

diamonds.title: Radiant Cut Diamond
diamonds.longDesc: Radiant cut diamonds combine step and brilliant facets for intense fire while maintaining durable corners, ideal for luxury rings and bracelets.

diamonds.title: Cushion Cut Diamond
diamonds.desc: Soft vintage charm with modern sparkle.
diamonds.longDesc: Cushion cut diamonds offer romantic pillow-shaped brilliance, highly sought after for vintage-inspired luxury jewellery and premium engagement rings.
